pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy, Type-Safe 'prediction()' Methods // A one-function package containing 'prediction()', a type-safe alternative to 'predict()' that always returns a data frame. The package currently supports common model types (e.g., "lm", "glm") from the 'stats' package, as well as numerous other model classes from other add-on packages. See the README or main package documentation page for a complete listing.
